title: To work or not to work

content.prompt: You will hear a series of brief conversations between two speakers. Each exchange will be spoken twice. You are to select, from the four choices, the reply that the first speaker would be most likely to make to the remark of the second speaker.

choices.label: En plus, les postes sont fermées aujourd'hui.
Je suis ravi, c'est un emploi idéal pour toi.
Tu savais que M. Trévier cherchait uns assistante de direction?
Tu ne devrais pas terminer tes études d'abord?

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
